content: important info to make the whole throw you must begin with the harvest moon block which is a separate pattern however you can use any of the extension patterns with any of the large cushion blocks the harvest moon extension is divided into four sections plus the border your purchase of the extension includes all four sections plus the border once the extension is complete the throw will measure 1 20m x 1 20m/50 x 50 this extension can be used separately to extend any of my 20 x 20 / 50cm x 50cm block patterns yardage for the harvest moon throw is approximately = to the golden tea floral thow yarn amount based on weight 1 3 kg 13 x 100gram balls @ 295m/322yds = 3835m/4186yds i used 17 x 100g balls = approximately 5015m/ 5474yds an overestimation taking into account small amounts used of various colours you re invited to join our lovely friendly and helpful pattern workshop group https //www facebook com/groups/thefloralhookpatternworkshopgroup
